entities.name: fred
entities.description: Fred is one of the Weasley twins who are playing Exploding Snap with Harry.

entities.name: george
entities.description: George is one of the Weasley twins who are playing Exploding Snap with Harry and being blackmailed by someone.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is a person who is playing Exploding Snap with Fred and George, and he wants to know who they were blackmailing.

relationships.description: Harry asked George if he was going to tell him about who they were blackmailing.
Fred and Harry are playing Exploding Snap together.
George was being blackmailed by someone, which Harry wants to know about.
